name: Shifty +
description:
-> PLAY IN FULL SCREEN! <- The maze is OUT OF PLACE! 1 level puzzle game made in 1 day for the Completion Jam.   Make it to the green square to exit the maze.   Controls: 'E' = Exit 'R' = restart level use wasd or arrow keys to move

If you are stuck watch the solution video to the right for help...
